title: Mikki on Hustler Cheating Scandal, Beating Baccarat, Tattoo Removal & More
description:
Mikki is here to put all the latest rumors to rest, with receipts and testimonies. Plus talks about how he's treated by casinos, and the latest headlines in the poker world.

----
00:00 Intro
1:45 Didn't know what No Jumper was when he did his first interview
3:54 Been offered a lot of money to promote on IG, he doesn't like their product or the people
4:38 Wants to help up and coming talent through his platform
10:54 Mikki blames and thanks Adam for inspiring him to do help other people through their sobriety journey 
13:39 Created Shaking Hearts a support system to help anyone who deals with addiction
15:37 Mikki says helping people through their addiction will be free of charge
20:02 Getting banned from Casino for winning too much money 
27:05 Mikki did the live interview with Full Send to show everything on his phone to show that he's a real player 
31:03 Mikki says poker is boring 
34:26 When Lil Baby posted their videos, fans were outraged because rich rappers don't need more money, regular people do 
35:54 Mikki then opened the floor to "strangers" to see how he can help them gamble, the response was overwhelming 
37:39 Twitch removing all content linked to online casinos + exposing online casinos
47:23 The Garrett Hustler cheating controversy "The Hand", stole 15k from the Casino
51:42 Mikki won't speak on whether that girl Robbie cheated or not
57:55 However, the misogynistic excuse holds no weight. Mikki doesn't F with Doug says he is a cornball, but admits he's a phenomenal player
1:06:49 Should metal detectors be mandatory at high stake games?
1:09:58 Mikki says whether the girl cheated or not, Garrett Hustler should have never made such a scene
1:16:35 In a committed relationship, used to wildin' in these streets, s_x tours etc
1:20:19 People supporting Mikki and verifying all his moves to be legit 
1:22:30 Mikki explains why he has participants added to this interview
1:26:34 Mikki explains who Mary is and why it's important for her to support him
1:27:36 Jake says it's pretty impossible to cheat at baccarat 
1:32:26 Vegas doesn't like winners obviously, especially large amount 
1:38:54 Mary's interview 
1:43:02 Casinos cater to players who gamble to gamble, play a lot and lose, as opposed to Mikki who wins a lot and then stops
1:46:00 Tattoo removal, Mikki started to remove everything from his face and he's gonna keep going1:48:45 Got arrested for having a F cops tattoo

---
